entries.title: Colin Jost Refuses To Be In Same Room As Pete Davidson After 'Something Big Happened' -- Fresh Details!
entries.summary:
WTF is going on between these old pals?? Saturday Night Live stars Colin Jost and Pete Davidson have been friends for years, both on and offscreen. Heck, they even became business partners recently, investing in a decommissioned Staten Island ferry to turn into a hotel/bar and restaurant. But a bombshell report last week in The US Sun [...]

entries.title: Diddy Miami Bash Featuring Naked Woman Buffet, Resurfaced 2004 Pics
entries.summary: It’s no surprise Diddy’s legendary parties attracted a star-studded crowd -- and now, a fresh batch of photos from 2 decades ago has surfaced, showing just how wild his shindigs used to get. Big names like Will Smith, Diana Ross and Owen Wilson…

entries.title: Ioan Gruffudd accuses ex-wife Alice Evans of violating restraining order AGAIN by continuing 'harassing' social media posts about him and new fiancée Bianca Wallace
entries.summary: Fantastic Four star Ioan Gruffudd is blasting his ex-wife Alice Evans, for continuing to make 'harassing and abusive' social media posts about him despite her restraining order.

entries.title: Donald Trump praises Keir Starmer ahead of their first meeting, saying the Labour leader 'ran a great race' - as PM addresses UN General Assembly
entries.summary: Speaking at a press conference at Trump Tower in New York, Mr Trump was asked what he made of Sir Keir and joked: 'Well I'm going to see him in about an hour so I have to be nice!'

entries.title: Taylor Swift Gave Travis Kelce The Sweetest Advice Ahead Of His Acting Debut In Grotesquerie!
entries.summary:
Taylor Swift wants Travis Kelce to follow his dreams! Earlier this week at the NYC premiere of Grotesquerie, showrunner Ryan Murphy answered curious fans’ questions about the new FX series — and of course T-Swizzle was brought up! While speaking on Trav’s acting debut, the showrunner revealed it was actually the NFL star’s girlfriend who [...]
